snippet.title: Craggenrock - Wishlist Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
Craggenrock is a crafting shop management game taking place on a remote island after a great disaster. You play as Arlo, a young crafter seeking a name of his own replacing his former crafting master in the mining town of Pareho. The game features a skill-based crafting, shopkeeping, haggling, and shop reputation systems.

🔥 Wishlist the game on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1889160/Craggenrock/Craggenrock/

✖️ Follow Craggenrock on X: https://x.com/Craggenrock
🎮Join the Craggenrock Discord server: https://discord.gg/Qr57WuM
Discord
